markdownRemark.html:
So I've decided to try and build Q (QEMU) on my Intel Mac - so I need subversion, using these instructions on how to build subversion on a mac.

Will it be faster? The tips on making Windows 2000 and XP faster actually worked really well.

How do you like that the build instructions actually work! The svn site for Transmission rejected my requests, so I downloaded the current sources from the Transmission homepage.

It might be fun to tweak some optimization flags for building Q, but I should probably go to sleep instead! The 0.9.0 build of Q does feel zippier though. :-)
